definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: A model for two-dimensional steady-state heat transfer of panel radiant floor heating system is established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了板式地板輻射供暖的二維穩態傳熱模型。

sentences.english: In heat transfer experiment, the calorie comparison theory and naphthalene sublimation technology are adopted.
sentences.chinese: 在傳熱實驗中，採用了熱質比擬原理及萘昇華技術。

sentences.english: A huge amount of experimental data is synthesized to establish a dimensionless number equation for intensified boiling heat transfer.
sentences.chinese: 並綜合大量實驗數據建立強化沸騰傳熱準數方程式。

sentences.english: A simple model for heat transfer analysis of flat-plate heat exchanger with Phase Change Material ( PCM )is built.
sentences.chinese: 建立了板式相變貯能換熱器的無量綱傳熱模型。

sentences.english: Based on the heat-transfer equations, computations were worked out through the use of finite difference method.
sentences.chinese: 根據傳熱方程採用有限差分法求解。

sentences.english: Fin-pitch of cooling coils is one of the primary factors which have an effect on their heat transfer performance.
sentences.chinese: 表冷器肋片間距是影響表冷器傳熱性能的主要因素。

sentences.english: So, it is necessary to research the actual non-newtonian fluids.
sentences.chinese: 所以，研究實際的非牛頓流體的傳熱就非常必要了。

sentences.english: From the sealing structure, it is similar to multi - layer cylindrical wall.
sentences.chinese: 從其結構上看，它相當於多層圓筒壁的傳熱。

sentences.english: Why Using Thermal Oil as Heat Transfer Medium?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼要使用導熱油作爲傳熱介質？

sentences.english: A proper scheme of the flow and heat-transfer model was established based on similarity theory.
sentences.chinese: 基於相似理論建立了玻殼模具冷卻器的流動傳熱模型。

sentences.english: The heater is adopted to directly heat the heat-transfer medium in the heat exchange chamber.
sentences.chinese: 加熱器適於直接加熱盛在熱交換箱中的傳熱介質。

sentences.english: The mechanism of heat transfer enhancement of transversely corrugated tube was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 文內還討論分析了橫紋管的傳熱強化機理。

sentences.english: It is more in conformity with the reality that the heat transfer of the pool wall is considered as in a two—dimension steady state.
sentences.chinese: 池壁的傳熱過程以二維穩態傳熱考慮比較實際情況。

sentences.english: It is more in conformity with the reality that the heat transfer of the pool wall is considered as in a two—dimension steady state.
sentences.chinese: 池壁的傳熱過程以二維穩態傳熱考慮比較實際情況。

sentences.english: The thermal conduction of a composite medium with variable thermal conductivities is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了可變導熱係數的複合介質的傳熱性質。

sentences.english: The experiments also aimed at analyzing the law of the variation of LHP's conductance with heat load.
sentences.chinese: 分析了迴路熱管熱導隨傳熱功率變化的規律。
